## table 类数据

此处做一个table类数据分析的记录。



```{r}
library(vcd)
library(gmodels)
```

table类数据此处主要记录，诸如Frequency and contingency tables。

```{r}
mytable1 <- xtabs(~ Treatment + Improved + Sex, data = Arthritis)

mytable2 <- xtabs(~ Treatment + Improved, data = Arthritis)
```



```{r}
class(mytable2)

class(with(Arthritis, table(Treatment, Improved)))
```



```{r}
vcd::mosaic(mytable1, shade=TRUE, legend=TRUE)
```


```{r}
mytable1 |> mantelhaen.test()
```


```{r}
mytable2 |> fisher.test()
```



```{r}
vcd::assocstats(mytable2)
```
